EmailTemplate.name: 201909_Americas_StandardAero_PEEF_M:1_kcr.201909_Americas_StandardAero_PrimusEli
EmailTemplate.subject: See Honeywell’s Primus Elite DU-875 Display in Action!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[http://standardaero.com/]]>
Dear, {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}}
The FAA has issued the Supplemental Type Certificate (STC) for Primus Elite Enhanced Features installation on your Learjet 45. StandardAero, a leader in cockpit display upgrades and Honeywell Authorized Avionics Dealers, is proud to have been one of the first to use JetCity's FAA-approved STC <[[https://www.ainonline.com/aviation-news/business-aviation/2019-07-24/standardaero-completes-learjet-45-cockpit-upgrade]]>.
Want to see the Primus Elite DU-875 Display in action?
Click below to watch Joey Meier, Pilot and Spotter for NASCAR champion Brad Keselowski, showcase the features and benefits Honeywell's brighter, clearer, high-resolution DU-875 displays and Primus Elite.
WATCH NOW <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0RiXoma4jlI]]>
Sincerely, Jerry SandersDirector, Avionics Program Management & Business DevelopmentStandardAero
